game.title: Realms of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, an ancient evil known as "The Devourer" threatens to destroy the fabric of reality. Players take on the role of a novice mage tasked with uncovering the mysteries behind The Devourer's return and stopping its destruction.
game.beginning: The game begins in the mystical realm of Aethoria, where players are introduced to their character, a young apprentice mage named Eira. As Eira, they embark on a journey to master magical abilities and explore the world beyond their village.
game.ending: After traversing treacherous landscapes, battling formidable foes, and solving ancient puzzles, Eira finally confronts The Devourer in an epic showdown. Depending on player choices throughout the game, the ending unfolds in one of three possible ways: saving Aethoria from destruction, succumbing to darkness and becoming a servant of The Devourer, or discovering a hidden truth that changes the course of history.
